messages.title: FOR A WORLD CLASS NHS
messages.content: The National Health Service is a fantastic institution—there for everyone, regardless of background or ability to pay. The Conservative Party has made the NHS its number one priority. Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year.

messages.title: FOR A LOW CARBON ECONOMY
messages.content: The Conservatives, under the leadership of David Cameron, will make building a Low Carbon Economy a priority.

messages.title: FOR ACTION ON SMASH EDO
messages.content: Last month, Smash EDO protesters invaded EDO MBM, causing chaos and seriously upsetting local residents. Charlotte Vere fully supports the conclusion of the review of police operations that will have taken place by the time you read this leaflet.

messages.title: FOR CHANGE ON OUR TRAINS
messages.content: Brighton’s train users have suffered for too long. Charlotte Vere wants your issues to fall all the way to the top and has received a huge response to her transport survey.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative party plans to make the NHS the number one priority by increasing spending every year.

Under the leadership of David Cameron, the Conservatives aim to build a Low Carbon Economy, focusing on energy independence from fossil fuels and encouraging lower carbon technology to protect our environment.
Charlotte Vere supports the outcome of the police review operations on Smash EDO protestors.
Charlotte Vere is committed to addressing the issues faced by train users in Brighton's constituency.

issues.environment: The Conservatives emphasize building a Low Carbon Economy to reduce dependence on fossil fuels and protect our environment. Energy independence from foreign oil and reducing low carbon emissions are priorities.
issues.health: The NHS is the number one priority for the Conservative Party, with a commitment to increase spending on it every year.

quotes.text: 'I'll cut the deficit, not the NHS.' - David Cameron

images.caption: Charlotte with environmental campaigner Zac Goldsmith
'I'll cut the deficit, not the NHS' - David Cameron

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Anthony Archer on behalf of Charlotte Vere, both at 68a Boundary Road, Hove BN3 5TD.
